name: MacKenzie Bourg
description: '''MacKenzie Richard Bourg''' ({{IPAc-en|lang|b|ɜːr}}; {{respell|BER}}; born September 11, 1992) is an American singer-songwriter originally from [[Lafayette, Louisiana]]. He placed fourth in the [[American Idol (season 15)|fifteenth season]] of the reality show ''[[American Idol]].'' Prior to appearing on ''American Idol'', Bourg competed in the [[The Voice (U.S. season 3)|third season]] of ''[[The Voice (U.S. TV series)|The Voice]]''.
